questions.description: An electric kettle has two heating coils. When one of the coil is connect to an a.c. source, the water in the kettle boils in 10 minutes. When the other coil is used the water boils in 40 minutes. If both the coils are connected in parallel, the time taken by the same quantity of water to boil will be :

options.description: copper strip increases and that of germanium decreases
copper strip decreases and that of germanium increases

options.description: high resistance and high melting point
high resistance and low melting point

questions.description: In a Wheatstone's bridge all the four arms have equal resistance R. If the resistance of the galvanometer are is also R, the equivalent resistance of the combination as seen by battery is :

options.description: the resistance and the specific resistance, will both remain unchanged
the resistance will be double and the specific  resistance, will be halved
the resistance will be halved and the specific  resistance, will remain unchanged
the resistance will be halved and the specific  resistance, will be doubled

options.description: flow in the direction which will be decided by the value of V

A galvanometer having a coil resistance of  60Ω  shows full scale deflection when a current of 1.0 amp passes through it. It can be converted into an ammeter to read currents upto 5.0 amp by :

questions.description: A galvanometer has coil of resistance 100 ohm and gives a full scale deflection for 30 mA current. If it is to work as a voltmeter of 30 volt range, the resistance required to be added will be :

Consider the following two statements :
(A)Kirchhoff's junction law follows from the conservation of charge 
(B)Kirchhoff's loop law follows from the conservation of energy 
Which of the following is correct :

options.description: Both A and B are correct
Both A and B are wrong
A is correct and B is wrong
A is wrong and B is correct

The effective resistance of a parallel connection that consists of four wires of equal length, equal area of cross-section and same material is 0.25 Ω. What will be the effective resistance of combination if they are connected in series :
Three resistor having resistances r₁, r₂ and r₃ are connected as shown in the given circuit. The ratio i₃/i₁ of current in terms of resistances used in the circuit is :

options.description: decreases for conductors but increases for semiconductors
